bio.title: I am Amina
bio.subtitle: Digital Marketing Specialist
bio.paragraph1: I'm Amina, a digital marketing specialist with a background in online strategy and brand management.
bio.paragraph2: I focus on creating data-driven strategies that enhance brand visibility and engagement. From SEO to social media marketing, I tailor my approach to meet each client's unique needs.
bio.paragraph3: My passion for marketing extends to content creation and analytics, where I help brands connect with their audience and measure performance effectively.

projects.subprojects: Discover some of my digital marketing projects:

project1.title: Organic Reach Campaign
project1.description: An SEO-focused project aimed at boosting organic traffic for a local business website.

project2.title: Social Media Growth Strategy
project2.description: Developed and implemented a social media strategy for a startup, resulting in a 150% growth in engagement.

project3.title: E-commerce PPC Campaign
project3.description: Created a targeted PPC advertising campaign for an online store, achieving a high ROI and increasing sales by 80%.
